issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

fields.summary: TiAPI: Review and clean up platform bugs and reduce bug count by 20%.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
{html}

found on 3g iphone (3.1.2) 4th gen ipod (4.1) mobile sdk build 1.5.0.8846d87

1.I have a very long long list of contacts (100's)
2.Phone>Contacts>display people
3.as soon as it loads, nackout and tap it again
4.repeat 2-3 times

results: soon enough the tableview Item will fail to load anything, it will dissapear on touch and nothing will occur.
happen on 1.4.1.1, not seen on the 4.02 or 4.1 device

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: 3.1.2 contacts picker - several load/back out/load results in silent fail on tableView item press

comments.body: Tested on an iPhone 3GS using TiSDK 2.2.0v20120821095711, unable to reproduce. Ticket marked as resolved.
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
